passages.text:
Note::Contact Name: Julia

Note::Contact Relation: Biological Mother

Note::Reason for Communication: Major Health Update

Note::I hope this letter finds you well.  We are writing to inform you that one ANGELA MELNIK has fallen into a persistent vegetative state, likely as a result of encephalitis.

Note::Based on our observations of the disease's progression in other children under our care, we do not expect her to recover.  However, we will continue to provide life support for as long as autonomic functions persist, and her participation in our neural research program will continue.

Note::We apologize for any distress this may cause.  If you would like us to cease providing updates for Angela's condition, please contact the children's ward's clerk.

Note::-Rosalind

Wiggly,surprised::...

[[p:So Julia's kid got sick and fell into a coma after she gave her to my mom's program...  I guess I'm not surprised.]]
[[p:Mom really couldn't walk two fucking flights of stairs to tell her this in person.  What a soulless bitch!]]

passages.text:
Julia's room is cloaked in a layer of ferns.  You can sense their spores permeating the room.  A constant drizzle of water pours in from the ceiling.

The entire room is dense with foliage, though the greenery is thickest near the pot towards the foot of the further cot.

[[p:(Action) Inspect the pot.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Inspect the pot.
links.link: p:(Action) Inspect the pot.

passages.name: Untitled Passage 1

passages.text:
A dense, mangled web of ferns is crawling out of the basket.  They appear to be suffocating a small piece of parchment stuck beneath their roots.

The basket itself appears charred, as though it hosted a small fire.  None of the basket's contents appear damaged by flame.

[[p:(Action) Reach in and grab the parchment.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Reach in and grab the parchment.
links.link: p:(Action) Reach in and grab the parchment.

passages.name: p:(Action) Inspect the pot.

passages.text:
You sink your arm deep into the mesh of ferns before you and begin blindly groping for the object you sense.  

You feel the stems of the greenery enveloping your arm, depriving you of oxygen.  The tendrils wrap tightly around your forearm.

[[p:(Action) Dig in deeper.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Dig in deeper.
links.link: p:(Action) Dig in deeper.

passages.name: p:(Action) Reach in and grab the parchment.

passages.text:
You force your arm deeper into the mesh.  Your fingers sift through roots and ash.

Just as the tips of your fingers begin to go numb, you feel it: the parchment begins grazing your palm.

You tighten your hand around the document.  You've got a solid grip.

[[p:(Action) Yank out the document.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Yank out the document.
links.link: p:(Action) Yank out the document.

passages.name: p:(Action) Dig in deeper.

passages.text:
You try and wrestle the document from the ferns, but the plants resist your pull.

You yank again, more firmly.  The roots don't yield.  They won't let your arm go.

You writhe and twist, but the ferns have you ensnared.  Your arm only sinks deeper into the pit of greenery.

You begin to panic.

[[p:Get the fuck off of me!]]
[[p:(Action) Kick the ferns.->p:Get the fuck off of me!]]

links.name: p:Get the fuck off of me!
links.link: p:Get the fuck off of me!

links.name: p:(Action) Kick the ferns.
links.link: p:Get the fuck off of me!

passages.name: p:(Action) Yank out the document.

passages.text:
The ferns do not respond to your agitations.  They have you in their teeth.

Jasper,twisted::You have to go on the aggressive.  Merely reacting never got you anywhere.

Jasper,head_tilted::Dive into the ferns and start biting, ripping, and tearing.  It's your only chance.

[[p:(Action) Start biting the ferns.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Start biting the ferns.
links.link: p:(Action) Start biting the ferns.

passages.name: p:Get the fuck off of me!

passages.text:
You dive into the pot and start ripping into the ferns with your teeth.  You can almost hear them squealing with pain.

But they do not relent.

Jasper,surprised::They still have your arm, and the document.  You have to go deeper!

[[p:(Action) Dive in further and keep biting the ferns.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Dive in further and keep biting the ferns.
links.link: p:(Action) Dive in further and keep biting the ferns.

passages.name: p:(Action) Start biting the ferns.

passages.text:
You dive headfirst towards the bottom of the basket, and bite the roots.  You taste the ash they've been feeding on.  Finally, you sense the ferns beginning to yield.

The grip on your arm begins to fade.  The stems that had begun to envelope the back of your head and neck retreat.  You might have a chance at yanking out the document now.

[[p:(Action) Free your arm.]]

links.name: p:(Action) Free your arm.
links.link: p:(Action) Free your arm.

passages.name: p:(Action) Dive in further and keep biting the ferns.

passages.text:
You manage to free yourself from the web of roots, and pulled the document out with you.

Jasper,twisted::Yes!  It worked!

Jasper,thinking::Hopefully this conditions you to follow my advice more readily in the future.

Wiggly,skeptical::Uhm.  Should I ask what that was about, mam?

[[p:No.]]
[[p:The ferns tried to eat me.  You should have helped me, but it doesn't matter anymore.]]
